languages.text: "Паранойя сводила Тисифону с ума, и однажды она создала Атлас Звездных Путей — реликвию Дома, что вживляют в наши тела с самого рождения. Удавка на шею. Наш дар и наше проклятие. С помощью Атласа Тисифона контролировала нас, подчиняла нашу волю и меняла мысли, а провинившихся — убивала взглядом".

traits.locale_text: "Паранойя сводила Тисифону с ума, и однажны она создала Атлас Звездных Путей — реликвию Дома, что вживляют в наши тела с самого рождения. Удавка на шею. Наш дар и наше проклятие. С помощью Атласа Тисифона контролировала нас, подчиняла нашу волю и меняла мысли, а провинившихся — убивала взглядом".

languages.text: "Paranoia was slowly driving Tisiphone insane, and one day she created the Starway Atlas — a relic that is implanted in our bodies at birth. A noose around our necks. Our gift and our damnation. Tisiphone used the Atlas to control us, subdue our will, and mould our thoughts. If anyone put a toe out of line, she killed them with a glance."
languages.original_text: "Паранойя сводила Тисифону с ума, и однажды она создала Атлас Звездных Путей — реликвию Дома, что вживляют в наши тела с самого рождения. Удавка на шею. Наш дар и наше проклятие. С помощью Атласа Тисифона контролировала нас, подчиняла нашу волю и меняла мысли, а провинившихся — убивала взглядом".

traits.locale_text: "Paranoia was driving Tisiphone insane, and one day she created the Starway Atlas — a relic that is implanted in our bodies at birth. A strangler on our necks. Our gift and our damnation. Tisiphone used the Atlas to control us, subdue our will and mould our thoughts. Those who committed an offense she killed with a glance."

"Paranoia was driving Tisiphone insane, and one day she created the Starway Atlas — a relic that is implanted in our bodies at birth. A strangler on our necks. Our gift and our damnation. Tisiphone used the Atlas to control us, subdue our will and mould our thoughts. Those who committed an offense she killed with a glance."

Tisiphone used the Atlas to control us, subdue our will, and mould our thoughts. If anyone put a toe out of line, she killed them with a glance."

Tisiphone used the Atlas to control us, subdue our will, and mould our thoughts. If anyone put a toe out of line, she killed them with a glance."

Tisiphone used the Atlas to control us, subdue our will, and mould our thoughts. If anyone put a toe out of line, she killed them with a glance."

languages.text: “慢慢地，提西福涅的偏执让她发了疯。某一天，她创造了群星圣仪。从我们诞生之日起，这个装置就会被植入我们体内。它就像绞索一样，套在我们的脖子上。这既是送给我们的礼物，也是对我们施加的诅咒。提西福涅通过群星圣仪来控制我们，驯服我们的意志，塑造我们的思想。要是有谁胆敢忤逆她，她只要一个眼神，就能要了那些人的命。”
languages.original_text: "Paranoia was slowly driving Tisiphone insane, and one day she created the Starway Atlas — a relic that is implanted in our bodies at birth. A noose around our necks. Our gift and our damnation. Tisiphone used the Atlas to control us, subdue our will, and mould our thoughts. If anyone put a toe out of line, she killed them with a glance."

traits.locale_text: “慢慢地，提西福涅的偏执让她发了疯。某一天，她创造了群星圣仪。从我们诞生之日起，这个装置就会被植入我们体内。它就像绞索一样，套在我们的脖子上。这既是送给我们的礼物，也是对我们施加的诅咒。提西福涅通过群星圣仪来控制我们，驯服我们的意志，塑造我们的思想。要是有谁胆敢忤逆她，她只要一个眼神，就能要了那些人的命。”

languages.text: «La paranoia estaba haciendo enloquecer lentamente a Tisiphone, que un día creó el Atlas de las Vías Estelares, una reliquia que se implanta en nuestros cuerpos al nacer. Es una soga al cuello, un don y una maldición al mismo tiempo. Tisiphone usó el Atlas para controlarnos, para subyugar nuestra voluntad y moldear nuestros pensamientos. Si alguien desobedecía en lo más mínimo, podía matarlo con una mirada».
languages.original_text: "Paranoia was slowly driving Tisiphone insane, and one day she created the Starway Atlas — a relic that is implanted in our bodies at birth. A noose around our necks. Our gift and our damnation. Tisiphone used the Atlas to control us, subdue our will, and mould our thoughts. If anyone put a toe out of line, she killed them with a glance."

traits.locale_text: «La paranoia estaba haciendo enloquecer lentamente a Tisiphone, que un día creó el Atlas de las Vías Estelares, una reliquia que se implanta en nuestros cuerpos al nacer. Es una soga al cuello, un don y una maldición al mismo tiempo. Tisiphone usó el Atlas para controlarnos, para subyugar nuestra voluntad y moldear nuestros pensamientos. Si alguien desobedecía en lo más mínimo, podía matarlo con una mirada».

languages.text: 「妄執は徐々にティシフォンを狂わせ、ある日彼女はスターウェイ・アトラスを作り出した。私たちの首にかけられた縄。私たちの贈り物であり、天罰でもあるあの遺物を。ティシフォンはアトラスを使って我々を支配し、意思を従わせ、思考を成形した。一線から少しでも外れると、彼女はためらいなく殺した」
languages.original_text: "Paranoia was slowly driving Tisiphone insane, and one day she created the Starway Atlas — a relic that is implanted in our bodies at birth. A noose around our necks. Our gift and our damnation. Tisiphone used the Atlas to control us, subdue our will, and mould our thoughts. If anyone put a toe out of line, she killed them with a glance."

traits.locale_text: 「妄執は徐々にティシフォンを狂わせ、ある日彼女はスターウェイ・アトラスを作り出した。私たちの首にかけられた縄。私たちの贈り物であり、天罰でもあるあの遺物を。ティシフォンはアトラスを使って我々を支配し、意思を従わせ、思考を成形した。一線から少しでも外れると、彼女はためらいなく殺した」

languages.text: "Die Paranoia trieb Tisiphone langsam in den Wahnsinn, und eines Tages erschuf sie den Atlas der Sternenwege – ein Relikt, das bei der Geburt in unsere Körper implantiert wird. Eine Schlinge um unseren Hals. Geschenk und Verdammnis zugleich. Tisiphone benutzte den Atlas, um uns zu kontrollieren, unseren Willen zu beugen und unsere Gedanken zu formen. Falls jemand auch nur einen Fuß vom Weg abging, tötete sie ihn mit einem Blick."
languages.original_text: "Paranoia was slowly driving Tisiphone insane, and one day she created the Starway Atlas — a relic that is implanted in our bodies at birth. A noose around our necks. Our gift and our damnation. Tisiphone used the Atlas to control us, subdue our will, and mould our thoughts. If anyone put a toe out of line, she killed them with a glance."

traits.locale_text: "Die Paranoia trieb Tisiphone langsam in den Wahnsinn, und eines Tages erschuf sie den Atlas der Sternenwege – ein Relikt, das bei der Geburt in unsere Körper implantiert wird. Eins Schlinge um unseren Hals. Geschenk und Verdammnis zugleich. Tisiphone benutzte den Atlas, um uns zu kontrollieren, unseren Willen zu beugen und unsere Gedanken zu formen. Falls jemand auch nur einen Fuß vom Weg abging, tötete sie ihn mit einem Blick."

languages.text: « Cette paranoïa la fit peu à peu sombrer dans la folie, et un jour, elle créa l'Atlas des étoiles, une relique greffée dans notre corps dès notre naissance. Une corde autour de notre cou. Un cadeau empoisonné. Tisiphone se servait de l'Atlas pour nous contrôler, nous soumettre à sa volonté et façonner nos pensées. Elle tuait d'un regard quiconque sortait du rang. »
languages.original_text: "Paranoia was slowly driving Tisiphone insane, and one day she created the Starway Atlas — a relic that is implanted in our bodies at birth. A noose around our necks. Our gift and our damnation. Tisiphone used the Atlas to control us, subdue our will, and mould our thoughts. If anyone put a toe out of line, she killed them with a glance."

traits.locale_text: « Cette paranoïa la fit peu à peu sombrer dans la folie, et un jour, elle créa l'Atlas des étoiles, une relique greffée dans notre corps dès notre naissance. Une corde autour de notre cou. Un cadeau empoisonné. Tisiphone se servait de l'Atlas pour nous contrôler, nous soumettre à sa volonté et façonner nos pensées. Elle tuait d'un regard quiconque sortait du rang. »

languages.text: "Paranoya yavaş yavaş Tisiphone'yi delirtti ve bir gün doğumumuzda vücudumuza entegre edilen o yadigârı, Yıldız Yolu Atlası'nı yarattı. Bu, boynumuza takılan bir tasmaydı; hem armağanımız hem de lanetimizdi. Tisiphone, Atlas'ı kullanarak bizi kontrol etti, iradesine mahkûm kıldı ve düşüncelerimizi manipüle etti. Çizginin dışına bir parmak boyu bile çıksanız sizi hiç düşünmeden öldürürdü."
languages.original_text: "Paranoia was slowly driving Tisiphone insane, and one day she created the Starway Atlas — a relic that is implanted in our bodies at birth. A noose around our necks. Our gift and our damnation. Tisiphone used the Atlas to control us, subdue our will, and mould our thoughts. If anyone put a toe out of line, she killed them with a glance."

traits.locale_text: "Paranoya yavaş yavaş Tisiphone'yi delirtti ve bir gün doğumumuzda vücudumuza entegre edilen o yadigârı, Yıldız Yolu Atlası'nı yarattı. Boynumuzdaki bir tasmaydı. Bizim hem armağanımız hem de lanetimizdi. Tisiphone, Atlas'ı kullanarak bizi kontrol etti, iradesine mahkûm kıldı ve düşüncelerimizi manipüle etti. Çizginin dışına bir parmak boyu bile çıksanız sizi hiç düşünmeden öldürürdü."
